projects.title: Colorator
projects.description: A self-initiated project to build & design a colour palette tool and sharing platform. I used React to make a dynamic front-end with usability and UX paramount to the design. I used Laravel to create an API to manage users, palettes and likes, with Sanctum implemented to handle user logins via API tokens. Fully tested with Laravels testing capabilities
projects.synops: A colour palette tool that allows a user to build, customise, save, and share colour palettes, as well as like other users palettes.

projects.synops: Website design and build for local garden design business.

projects.title: My-Records
projects.description: A collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection. Created using OOP principles with vanilla PHP and a MySQL database, without a framework in order to gain a deeper understanding of CRUD operations. This was an individual project with pull request reviews required upon the completion of each story and is fully unit tested.
projects.synops: A collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection.
